means: 番泻树，晒干的番泻叶（可制取轻泻剂）

word_mean: 〔USP〕番泻叶：豆科植物尖叶番泻树〔Cassia senna L.〕或狭叶番泻树〔C.angustifoliaVahl.〕的一种干燥叶，含有番泻甙A和B、大黄葡萄糖苷以及大黄酸

sentence.Network_en: By lap 26, Senna had moved up into second position.
sentence.Network_cn: 到第二十六圈时, 赛娜已经追到了第二的位置上.

sentence.Network_en: Senna says he is not out to maim, just disrupt a game.
sentence.Network_cn: 塞纳说他并非为了使人受伤而犯规, 她只是想中断比赛.

sentence.Network_en: Michael takes the dark victory following Senna's fatal accident.
sentence.Network_cn: 迈克尔在塞纳致命的事故之后拿到了这个黑暗的冠军.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 番泻叶目前卫生署已开放番泻叶（Senna），用于辅助排便顺畅的健康诉求。一般减肥茶、排宿便的药草茶中，普遍含有番泻叶。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from medieval Latin sena, from Arabic sanā

means.word_mean: 1. any of various plants of the genus Senna having pinnately compound leaves and showy usually yellow flowers; many are used medicinally
